verbose_text: Furthermore, western blot analysis revealed that the level of active caspase-3 was reduced in the islets co-cultured with ADMSCs-BET (XREF_FIG), and a decreased amount of apoptotic cells (green fluorescence) was detected in the islets co-cultured with ADMSCs-BET, as shown by Annexin V FITC and PI staining (XREF_FIG).
